import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/CartIcon' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/CartDropdown' import { selectCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cartSelectors' import { selectCurrentUser } from '../../redux/user/userSelectors' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './Header.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> LOGOUT
) : ( LOGIN )}
{hidden ? null : }
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ currentUser: selectCurrentUser, hidden: selectCartHidden, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
